title: Indian potato raised pie
description: A brilliant addition to a buffet this veggie pie with a robust hot water crust pastry is full of southern Indian flavour and  warming spice.Equipment and preparation: for this recipe you will need a 20cm/8in springform cake tin.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz solid vegetable fat (such as Cookeen or Trex), plus extra for greasing
1 free-range egg yolk, beaten, to glaze
